title: Will you b buying australian bananas?
content:
following cyclone larry in northern queensland & the damage it caused, will you b buying aussie bananas at almost AU$6 a kilo
i won't be it's just too much money, we could import bananas but australia doesn't because of bio security

[url=http://www.theaustralian.news.com.au/common/story_page/0,5744,18547959%255E1702,00.html]here[/url] is that story again that i posted in the favorite fruit poll

the answer is yes or no, please vote[url=http://www.ironmaiden.com][img]http://i11.photobucket.com/albums/a199/rorie1983/ironmaiden.jpg[/img][/url]
